About HAI 2026

The 3rd edition of the Healthcare AI (HAI) Symposium returns to Singapore from 8–10 July 2026, convening the healthcare innovation ecosystem to exchange ideas, forge collaborations, and connect across disciplines.

This year’s symposium is dedicated to “Designing the Future of Intelligent Health: Advancing Healthcare Through AI, MedTech and Digital Systems.”

Join us to explore the latest developments in AI, MedTech, and digital healthcare, alongside policymakers, healthcare professionals, academics, investors, and industry leaders, as we shape the future of intelligent health together.


Experience

two-days of cutting-edge insights in healthcare AI and digital innovations.

Gain

practical skills in our full-day hands-on workshop.

Showcase

your startup at the Healthcare Innovation Pitch Challenge!

Revisit HAI 2025

HAI 2025 brought together more than 250 healthcare innovators for a high-impact gathering featuring 20 expert speakers, 3 dynamic panel discussions, 19 cutting-edge tech showcases, and an inaugural Healthcare Innovation Pitch Challenge.
